definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]

sentences.english: I thanked Hannah and said goodbye.
That was a long time after Hanna had left the city.
sentences.chinese: 那是漢娜離開這座城市後好長時間的事了。

sentences.english: The light changed and they drove on, but Hannah was too young to be reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 燈變綠了他們繼續開着，但是漢娜太小不知事理。

sentences.english: Then there is the picture of Hanna in my father`s study.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個就是漢娜站在我父親書房的畫面。

sentences.english: The Hanna who could cry was closer to me than the Hanna who was only strong.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，會哭的漢娜比只會強硬的漢娜更親近。

sentences.english: The Hanna who could cry was closer to me than the Hanna who was only strong.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，會哭的漢娜比只會強硬的漢娜更親近。

sentences.english: Henry and Hannah almost immediately became more careful spenders.
sentences.chinese: 亨利和漢娜的消費立即變得更謹慎了。

sentences.english: Hannah was asked her opinion of a popular play.
sentences.chinese: 他向漢娜徵求她對一部熱門戲劇的意見。

sentences.english: Not that Hanna and I weren`t happy again after the first day of Easter vacation.
sentences.chinese: 復活節過後的第一天，漢娜和我過的都挺開心的。

sentences.english: Maybe Henry and Hannah were too young.
sentences.chinese: 也許亨利和漢娜當時還太小。

sentences.english: It was if Hannah had taken her turn and put the menorah in your window for me to see.
sentences.chinese: 就彷彿是漢娜將聖燭臺放在你的窗臺上讓我看到一樣。

sentences.english: She was probably expecting to talk to me when I visited Hanna.
sentences.chinese: 她大概是期望在我探望漢娜時跟我談談。

sentences.english: It made me think of the autumn pictures in Hanna`s cell.
sentences.chinese: 這使我想起了漢娜監舍裏那些秋天的圖畫。

sentences.english: Hannah, tell her you don't want meat sauce on your spaghetti.
sentences.chinese: 漢娜，告訴她你喫意大利細麪條的時候不喜歡放肉醬。

sentences.english: No, Hanna had not decided in favor of crime.
sentences.chinese: 不，漢娜沒有決定待人受過。

definition: Jeanne d'Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English/also called Jehanne Darc, the Maid or Orleans, Joan of Arc or St Joan
Midsummer night's dream, comedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]
